name: Clever Improviser
summary: You’ve learned how to handle situations when you’re out of your depth.
description:
You’ve learned how to handle situations when you’re out of your depth. You gain the Untrained Improvisation general feat. In addition, you can attempt skill actions that normally require you to be trained, even if you are untrained.Clever Improviser Leads To...

Incredible ImprovisationTraitsHuman: A creature with this trait is a member of the human ancestry. Humans are a diverse array of people known for their adaptability. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by humans.
